text: Mindy Kaling at the 2018 Vanity Fair Oscar Party Dia Dipasupil / Getty Images There is currently a meme making its rounds on social media that plays on the phrase, ` ` If you can't handle me at my worst, you don't deserve me at my best.'' A Twitter user recently used photos of Mindy Kaling for the meme, comparing a photo of her character from ` ` The Office'' to a recent photo of the actress on the red carpet. Kaling caught wind of the tweet and responded in a hilarious way. ` ` I don't get this, I'm equally pretty in both.'' While some users thought the original meme implied colorism, because Kaling's skin looked lighter in the second
